ca.cmput301w14t09

Class MainActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • ca.cmput301w14t09.MainActivity

  • public class MainActivity
extends Activity
    Author:
    Conner MainActivity of the app. displays a list of current users on the device and allows you to create a new user or sign in as a guest

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainActivity() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void guestUser(View v)
      guestUser is called when the guest button is pressed Sets user to guest user and then calls topComments with the guest user
      User loadUser(java.lang.String text)
      loadUser calls FileLoading.returnUser(text, this) which gets a user and then returns the user that FileLoading.returnUser(text, this) gets
      void newUser(View v)
      newUser is called when continue button is pressed this method is run.
      boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) 
      void onStart()
      onStart populates the listview with clickable usernames that have already been created on the device
      void topComments(User user)
      topComments takes in a username selected in the listview and starts the next activity with that user

        public void onStart()
        onStart populates the listview with clickable usernames that have already been created on the device

      • newUser

        public void newUser(View v)
        newUser is called when continue button is pressed this method is run. It grabs the username entered in the text field and creates a new user with it. Then starts the next activity with the newly created user
        Parameters:
        v -

      • topComments

        public void topComments(User user)
        topComments takes in a username selected in the listview and starts the next activity with that user
        Parameters:
        user -

        guestUser is called when the guest button is pressed Sets user to guest user and then calls topComments with the guest user
        Parameters:

      • loadUser

        public User loadUser(java.lang.String text)

        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
